statements: SELECT customer_name, total_spending FROM customer_spending_patterns
SELECT * FROM customer_spending_patterns WHERE total_spending > 1000
SELECT customer_name, average_monthly_spending FROM customer_spending_patterns ORDER BY average_monthly_spending DESC
SELECT customer_name, last_purchase_date FROM customer_spending_patterns WHERE last_purchase_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT total_spending FROM customer_spending_patterns ORDER BY total_spending
SELECT customer_name, total_spending FROM customer_spending_patterns WHERE total_spending > 1000 ORDER BY total_spending DESC
SELECT customer_name, average_monthly_spending FROM customer_spending_patterns WHERE average_monthly_spending > 500 ORDER BY average_monthly_spending ASC
SELECT customer_name, last_purchase_date FROM customer_spending_patterns WHERE last_purchase_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC

SELECT total_spending, average_monthly_spending FROM customer_spending_patterns WHERE total_spending > 500 AND average_monthly_spending < 300 ORDER BY total_spending DESC, average_monthly_spending ASC
SELECT * FROM customer_spending_patterns WHERE customer_id = 1001
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30
SELECT name, total_spending FROM customers
SELECT customer_id, name, city FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 5000
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, name, total_spending FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY total_spending DESC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_date, t.amount, c.name FROM transactions t JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE c.age < 40 AND t.amount > 1000 ORDER BY t.transaction_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, city, SUM(total_spending) AS total_spending FROM customers GROUP BY city HAVING total_spending > 5000 ORDER BY city;
SELECT c.name, t.amount FROM transactions t JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE c.city = 'Los Angeles' AND t.category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY t.amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT recommendation_text FROM recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM customers INNER JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions;
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM customer_transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT account_id, balance FROM customer_accounts WHERE balance > 10000;
SELECT * FROM recommendations ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT customer_profiles.full_name, customer_accounts.balance, customer_transactions.amount FROM customer_profiles JOIN customer_accounts ON customer_profiles.customer_id = customer_accounts.customer_id JOIN customer_transactions ON customer_profiles.customer_id = customer_transactions.customer_id;
SELECT customer_profiles.email, recommendations.recommendation_text FROM customer_profiles LEFT JOIN recommendations ON customer_profiles.customer_id = recommendations.customer_id;

SELECT customer_accounts.account_type, SUM(customer_transactions.amount) AS total_amount FROM customer_accounts JOIN customer_transactions ON customer_accounts.customer_id = customer_transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_accounts.account_type;
SELECT customer_accounts.balance, recommendation_text FROM customer_accounts CROSS JOIN recommendations;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30
SELECT customer_id, gender, income FROM customer_demographics ORDER BY income DESC
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT customer_id, total_spending, average_transaction_amount FROM spending_behavior
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY income DESC
SELECT customer_id, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE income > 50000
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE category = 'Grocery' LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, total_spending FROM spending_behavior WHERE average_transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY total_spending DESC
SELECT * FROM financial_recommendations WHERE recommendation_date >= '2022-01-01'
